name: Hot On the Tail
description:
Feature

- Combat system based on height
- Agile movement
- Tools system
- Stealth exploration

Narrative

You are playing as a detective cat, which must defeat the gangs which have taken illegal power within the city.
Will you discover why and how they act? Try to defeat all the criminals in your town!
